50 MRAC::MRAC(MultiThreadedNode& node) :
51  Control(node)
52 {

63 // Constructor initializes the full_state and sets the Eigen::Map references
64 MRAC::StateController::StateController() :
65  full_state(110, 0.0), // full_state vector
66  state_roll_des_filter(full_state.data()), // Maps the elements [0:1]
67  state_pitch_des_filter(full_state.data() + 2), // Maps the elements [2:3]
68  state_roll_dot_des_filter(full_state.data() + 4), // Maps the elements [4:5]
69  state_pitch_dot_des_filter(full_state.data() + 6), // Maps the elements [6:7]
70  integral_translational_position_error(full_state.data() + 8), // Maps the elements [8:10]
71  integral_angular_error(full_state.data() + 11), // Maps the elements [11:13]
72  x_ref_translational(full_state.data() + 14), // Maps the elements [14:19]
73  integral_translational_position_error_ref(full_state.data() + 20), // Maps the elements [20:22]
74  K_hat_x_translational(full_state.data() + 23), // Maps the elements [23:40]
75  K_hat_r_translational(full_state.data() + 41), // Maps the elements [41:49]
76  Theta_hat_translational(full_state.data() + 50), // Maps the elements [50:67]

80  Theta_hat_rotational(full_state.data() + 89), // Maps the elements [89:106]
81  integral_angular_velocity_error_ref(full_state.data() + 107) // Maps the elements [107:109]
82 {}

154 /*
155  Function to read the tuning gains coming from the .json file and assign it to the
156  gains_ struct instantiated in the MRAC class
157 */
158 void MRAC::readJSONfile(const std::string& fileName)
159 {
160  // Define the path where the MRAC gains JSON files are located
161  const std::string path = "./src/flightstack/params/control/mrac/";
162 
163  // Concatenate the path with the file name
164  std::string jsonFile = path + fileName;
165 
166  std::ifstream file(jsonFile);
167  if (!file.is_open()) {
168  throw std::runtime_error("Could not open file: " + jsonFile);
169  }
170 
171  nlohmann::json j;
172  file >> j;
173 
174  gains_.KP_refmod_translational = extractMatrixFromJSON<double, 3, 3>(j["BASELINE"]["KP_refmod_translational"]);
175  gains_.KD_refmod_translational = extractMatrixFromJSON<double, 3, 3>(j["BASELINE"]["KD_refmod_translational"]);
176  gains_.KI_refmod_translational = extractMatrixFromJSON<double, 3, 3>(j["BASELINE"]["KI_refmod_translational"]);
177  gains_.KP_translational = extractMatrixFromJSON<double, 3, 3>(j["BASELINE"]["KP_translational"]);
178  gains_.KD_translational = extractMatrixFromJSON<double, 3, 3>(j["BASELINE"]["KD_translational"]);
179  gains_.KI_translational = extractMatrixFromJSON<double, 3, 3>(j["BASELINE"]["KI_translational"]);
180  gains_.KP_omega_cmd_rotational = extractMatrixFromJSON<double, 3, 3>(j["BASELINE"]["KP_omega_cmd_rotational"]);
181  gains_.KI_omega_cmd_rotational = extractMatrixFromJSON<double, 3, 3>(j["BASELINE"]["KI_omega_cmd_rotational"]);
182  gains_.KP_omega_ref_rotational = extractMatrixFromJSON<double, 3, 3>(j["BASELINE"]["KP_omega_ref_rotational"]);
183  gains_.KI_omega_ref_rotational = extractMatrixFromJSON<double, 3, 3>(j["BASELINE"]["KI_omega_ref_rotational"]);
184  gains_.KP_rotational = extractMatrixFromJSON<double, 3, 3>(j["BASELINE"]["KP_rotational"]);
185  gains_.KD_rotational = extractMatrixFromJSON<double, 3, 3>(j["BASELINE"]["KD_rotational"]);
186  gains_.KI_rotational = extractMatrixFromJSON<double, 3, 3>(j["BASELINE"]["KI_rotational"]);
187  gains_.Gamma_x_translational = extractMatrixFromJSON<double, 6, 6>(j["ADAPTIVE"]["Gamma_x_translational"]);
188  gains_.Gamma_r_translational = extractMatrixFromJSON<double, 3, 3>(j["ADAPTIVE"]["Gamma_r_translational"]);
189  gains_.Gamma_Theta_translational = extractMatrixFromJSON<double, 6, 6>(j["ADAPTIVE"]["Gamma_Theta_translational"]);
190  gains_.Q_translational = extractMatrixFromJSON<double, 6, 6>(j["ADAPTIVE"]["Q_translational"]);
191  gains_.sigma_x_translational = j["ADAPTIVE"]["sigma_x_translational"];
192  gains_.sigma_r_translational = j["ADAPTIVE"]["sigma_r_translational"];
193  gains_.sigma_Theta_translational = j["ADAPTIVE"]["sigma_Theta_translational"];
194  gains_.dead_zone_delta_translational = j["ADAPTIVE"]["dead_zone_delta_translational"];
195  gains_.dead_zone_e0_translational = j["ADAPTIVE"]["dead_zone_e0_translational"];
196  gains_.x_e_x_translational = extractMatrixFromJSON<double, 18, 1>(j["ADAPTIVE"]["x_e_x_translational"]);
197  gains_.S_diagonal_x_translational = extractMatrixFromJSON<double, 18, 1>(j["ADAPTIVE"]["S_diagonal_x_translational"]);
198  gains_.alpha_x_translational = j["ADAPTIVE"]["alpha_x_translational"];
199  gains_.x_e_r_translational = extractMatrixFromJSON<double, 9, 1>(j["ADAPTIVE"]["x_e_r_translational"]);
200  gains_.S_diagonal_r_translational = extractMatrixFromJSON<double, 9, 1>(j["ADAPTIVE"]["S_diagonal_r_translational"]);
201  gains_.alpha_r_translational = j["ADAPTIVE"]["alpha_r_translational"];
202  gains_.x_e_Theta_translational = extractMatrixFromJSON<double, 18, 1>(j["ADAPTIVE"]["x_e_Theta_translational"]);
203  gains_.S_diagonal_Theta_translational = extractMatrixFromJSON<double, 18, 1>(j["ADAPTIVE"]["S_diagonal_Theta_translational"]);
204  gains_.alpha_Theta_translational = j["ADAPTIVE"]["alpha_Theta_translational"];
205  gains_.Gamma_x_rotational = extractMatrixFromJSON<double, 3, 3>(j["ADAPTIVE"]["Gamma_x_rotational"]);
206  gains_.Gamma_r_rotational = extractMatrixFromJSON<double, 3, 3>(j["ADAPTIVE"]["Gamma_r_rotational"]);
207  gains_.Gamma_Theta_rotational = extractMatrixFromJSON<double, 6, 6>(j["ADAPTIVE"]["Gamma_Theta_rotational"]);
208  gains_.Q_rotational = extractMatrixFromJSON<double, 3, 3>(j["ADAPTIVE"]["Q_rotational"]);
209  gains_.sigma_x_rotational = j["ADAPTIVE"]["sigma_x_rotational"];
210  gains_.sigma_r_rotational = j["ADAPTIVE"]["sigma_r_rotational"];
211  gains_.sigma_Theta_rotational = j["ADAPTIVE"]["sigma_Theta_rotational"];
212  gains_.dead_zone_delta_rotational = j["ADAPTIVE"]["dead_zone_delta_rotational"];
213  gains_.dead_zone_e0_rotational = j["ADAPTIVE"]["dead_zone_e0_rotational"];
214  gains_.x_e_x_rotational = extractMatrixFromJSON<double, 9, 1>(j["ADAPTIVE"]["x_e_x_rotational"]);
215  gains_.S_diagonal_x_rotational = extractMatrixFromJSON<double, 9, 1>(j["ADAPTIVE"]["S_diagonal_x_rotational"]);
216  gains_.alpha_x_rotational = j["ADAPTIVE"]["alpha_x_rotational"];
217  gains_.x_e_r_rotational = extractMatrixFromJSON<double, 9, 1>(j["ADAPTIVE"]["x_e_r_rotational"]);
218  gains_.S_diagonal_r_rotational = extractMatrixFromJSON<double, 9, 1>(j["ADAPTIVE"]["S_diagonal_r_rotational"]);
219  gains_.alpha_r_rotational = j["ADAPTIVE"]["alpha_r_rotational"];
220  gains_.x_e_Theta_rotational = extractMatrixFromJSON<double, 18, 1>(j["ADAPTIVE"]["x_e_Theta_rotational"]);
221  gains_.S_diagonal_Theta_rotational = extractMatrixFromJSON<double, 18, 1>(j["ADAPTIVE"]["S_diagonal_Theta_rotational"]);
222  gains_.alpha_Theta_rotational = j["ADAPTIVE"]["alpha_Theta_rotational"];
223 
224 }
225 
226 /*
227  Function that given the gains read from the JSON file, initializes the rest of the parameters accordingly
228 */
229 void MRAC::initializeControllerParameters(VehicleInfo& vehicle_info, GainsMRAC& gains_)
230 {
231  // Initialize to zero the 6x6 matrix and set the top-right 3x3 block as follows
232  gains_.A_translational.setZero();
233  gains_.A_translational.block<3, 3>(0, 3) = Eigen::Matrix3d::Identity();
234 
235  // Initialize to zero the 6x3 matrix and set the bottom 3x3 block as follows
236  gains_.B_translational.setZero();
237  gains_.B_translational.block<3, 3>(3, 0) = Eigen::Matrix3d::Identity();
238 
239  // Initialize to zero the 6x6 matrix
240  gains_.A_ref_translational.setZero();
241  // Set the top-right 3x3 block as follows
242  gains_.A_ref_translational.block<3, 3>(0, 3) = Eigen::Matrix3d::Identity();
243  // Set the bottom-left 3x3 block as follows
244  gains_.A_ref_translational.block<3, 3>(3, 0) = -gains_.KP_refmod_translational;
245  // Set the bottom-right 3x3 block as follows
246  gains_.A_ref_translational.block<3, 3>(3, 3) = -gains_.KD_refmod_translational;
247 
248  // Initialize to zero the 6x3 matrix and set the bottom 3x3 block as follows
249  gains_.B_ref_translational.setZero();
250  gains_.B_ref_translational.block<3, 3>(3, 0) = (1 / vehicle_info.mass) * Eigen::Matrix3d::Identity();
251 
252  // Initialize to zero the 3x3 matrix
253  gains_.A_rotational.setZero();
254 
255  // Set the 3x3 matrix as follows
256  gains_.B_rotational = Eigen::Matrix3d::Identity();
257 
258  // Set the 3x3 matrix as follows
259  gains_.A_ref_rotational = -gains_.KP_omega_ref_rotational;
260 
261  // Set the 3x3 matrix as follows
262  gains_.B_ref_rotational = Eigen::Matrix3d::Identity();
263 
264  // Solve the continuos Lyapunov equation to compute P_translational
265  gains_.P_translational = RealContinuousLyapunovEquation(gains_.A_ref_translational,
266  gains_.Q_translational);
267 
268  // Solve the continuos Lyapunov equation to compute P_rotational
269  gains_.P_rotational = RealContinuousLyapunovEquation(gains_.A_ref_rotational,
270  gains_.Q_rotational);
271 
272  // Projection operator. Generate the S matrices from their ellipsoid semi-axis terms contained in S_diagonal
273  gains_.S_x_translational = projection_operator::generateEllipsoidMatrixFromDiagonal(gains_.S_diagonal_x_translational);
274  gains_.S_r_translational = projection_operator::generateEllipsoidMatrixFromDiagonal(gains_.S_diagonal_r_translational);
275  gains_.S_Theta_translational = projection_operator::generateEllipsoidMatrixFromDiagonal(gains_.S_diagonal_Theta_translational);
276  gains_.S_x_rotational = projection_operator::generateEllipsoidMatrixFromDiagonal(gains_.S_diagonal_x_rotational);
277  gains_.S_r_rotational = projection_operator::generateEllipsoidMatrixFromDiagonal(gains_.S_diagonal_r_rotational);
278  gains_.S_Theta_rotational = projection_operator::generateEllipsoidMatrixFromDiagonal(gains_.S_diagonal_Theta_rotational);
279 
280  // Projection operator. Compute epsilon from alpha
281  gains_.epsilon_x_translational = projection_operator::computeEpsilonFromAlpha(gains_.alpha_x_translational);
282  gains_.epsilon_r_translational = projection_operator::computeEpsilonFromAlpha(gains_.alpha_r_translational);
283  gains_.epsilon_Theta_translational = projection_operator::computeEpsilonFromAlpha(gains_.alpha_Theta_translational);
284  gains_.epsilon_x_rotational = projection_operator::computeEpsilonFromAlpha(gains_.alpha_x_rotational);
285  gains_.epsilon_r_rotational = projection_operator::computeEpsilonFromAlpha(gains_.alpha_r_rotational);
286  gains_.epsilon_Theta_rotational = projection_operator::computeEpsilonFromAlpha(gains_.alpha_Theta_rotational);
287 
288 }
289 
290 /*
291  Assigning the right-hand side of the differential equations to the first time derivative of the full_state.
292 */
293 void MRAC::assignSystemToDxdt(state_type /* &x */, state_type &dxdt, const double /* t */)
294 {
295  int current_index = 0; // Starting index for assignments
296 
297  // Assign to elements [0:1] of 'dxdt' --> 'internal_state_roll_des_filter'
298  this->assignElementsToDxdt(this->cim.internal_state_roll_des_filter, dxdt, current_index);
299  // Assign to elements [2:3] of 'dxdt' --> 'internal_state_pitch_des_filter'
300  this->assignElementsToDxdt(this->cim.internal_state_pitch_des_filter, dxdt, current_index);
301  // Assign to elements [4:5] of 'dxdt' --> 'internal_state_roll_dot_des_filter'
302  this->assignElementsToDxdt(this->cim.internal_state_roll_dot_des_filter, dxdt, current_index);
303  // Assign to elements [6:7] of 'dxdt' --> 'internal_state_pitch_dot_des_filter'
304  this->assignElementsToDxdt(this->cim.internal_state_pitch_dot_des_filter, dxdt, current_index);
305  // Assign to elements [8:10] of 'dxdt' --> 'translational_position_error'
306  this->assignElementsToDxdt(this->cim.translational_position_error, dxdt, current_index);
307  // Assign to elements [11:13] of 'dxdt' --> 'angular_error'
308  this->assignElementsToDxdt(this->cim.angular_error, dxdt, current_index);
309  // Assign to elements [14:19] of 'dxdt' --> 'x_ref_dot_translational'
310  this->assignElementsToDxdt(this->csim_.x_ref_dot_translational, dxdt, current_index);
311  // Assign to elements [20:22] of 'dxdt' --> 'translational_position_error_ref'
312  this->assignElementsToDxdt(this->csim_.translational_position_error_ref, dxdt, current_index);
313  // Assign to elements [23:40] of 'dxdt' --> 'K_hat_x_dot_translational'
314  this->assignElementsToDxdt(this->csim_.K_hat_x_dot_translational, dxdt, current_index);
315  // Assign to elements [41:49] of 'dxdt' --> 'K_hat_r_dot_translational'
316  this->assignElementsToDxdt(this->csim_.K_hat_r_dot_translational, dxdt, current_index);
317  // Assign to elements [50:67] of 'dxdt' --> 'Theta_hat_dot_translational'
318  this->assignElementsToDxdt(this->csim_.Theta_hat_dot_translational, dxdt, current_index);
319  // Assign to elements [68:70] of 'dxdt' --> 'omega_ref_dot_rotational'
320  this->assignElementsToDxdt(this->csim_.omega_ref_dot_rotational, dxdt, current_index);
321  // Assign to elements [71:79] of 'dxdt' --> 'K_hat_x_dot_rotational'
322  this->assignElementsToDxdt(this->csim_.K_hat_x_dot_rotational, dxdt, current_index);
323  // Assign to elements [80:88] of 'dxdt' --> 'K_hat_r_dot_rotational'
324  this->assignElementsToDxdt(this->csim_.K_hat_r_dot_rotational, dxdt, current_index);
325  // Assign to elements [89:106] of 'dxdt' --> 'Theta_hat_dot_rotational'
326  this->assignElementsToDxdt(this->csim_.Theta_hat_dot_rotational, dxdt, current_index);
327  // Assign to elements [107:109] of 'dxdt' --> 'angular_velocity_error_ref'
328  this->assignElementsToDxdt(this->csim_.angular_velocity_error_ref, dxdt, current_index);
329 }
330 
331 /*
332  Function to compute the variables used for the differentiator of the desired roll and pitch angles.
333  This function calculates the internal states and derivatives (first and second) of the roll and pitch
334  desired angles using the provided filter coefficients and the current state variables.
335 */
336 void MRAC::computeFilterDifferentiatorVariables(ControlInternalMembers& cim,
337  VehicleInfo& vehicle_info,
338  StateController& state_)
339 {
340  cim.internal_state_roll_des_filter = vehicle_info.A_filter_roll_des * state_.state_roll_des_filter
341  + vehicle_info.B_filter_roll_des * cim.roll_desired;
342 
343  cim.internal_state_pitch_des_filter = vehicle_info.A_filter_pitch_des * state_.state_pitch_des_filter
344  + vehicle_info.B_filter_pitch_des * cim.pitch_desired;
345 
346  cim.roll_desired_dot = vehicle_info.C_filter_roll_des * state_.state_roll_des_filter;
347  cim.pitch_desired_dot = vehicle_info.C_filter_pitch_des * state_.state_pitch_des_filter;
348 
349 
350  cim.internal_state_roll_dot_des_filter = vehicle_info.A_filter_roll_dot_des * state_.state_roll_dot_des_filter
351  + vehicle_info.B_filter_pitch_des * cim.roll_desired_dot;
352 
353  cim.internal_state_pitch_dot_des_filter = vehicle_info.A_filter_pitch_dot_des * state_.state_pitch_dot_des_filter
354  + vehicle_info.B_filter_pitch_dot_des * cim.pitch_desired_dot;
355 
356  cim.roll_desired_dot_dot = vehicle_info.C_filter_roll_dot_des * state_.state_roll_dot_des_filter;
357  cim.pitch_desired_dot_dot = vehicle_info.C_filter_pitch_dot_des * state_.state_pitch_dot_des_filter;
358 }
359 
360 /*
361  OUTER LOOP CONTROLLER
362 */
363 void MRAC::computeOuterLoop(ControlInternalMembers& cim,
364  VehicleInfo& vehicle_info,
365  StateController& state_,
366  ControlReferences& cr,
367  GainsMRAC& gains_,
368  ControllerSpecificInternalMembers& csim_)
369 {
370  // Compute the translational_position_error [actual - reference_model]
371  this->computeTranslationalPositionError(cim, cr.position, state_.x_ref_translational.head<3>());
372  // Compute the translational_position_error_ref [reference_model - user_defined_trajectory]
373  csim_.translational_position_error_ref = state_.x_ref_translational.head<3>() - cr.user_defined_position;
374 
375  // Reference command input [reference_model - user_defined_trajectory]
376  csim_.r_cmd_translational = vehicle_info.mass * (
377  - gains_.KI_refmod_translational * state_.integral_translational_position_error_ref
378  + gains_.KP_refmod_translational * cr.user_defined_position
379  + gains_.KD_refmod_translational * cr.user_defined_velocity
380  + cr.user_defined_acceleration
381  );
382 
383  // Reference model
384  csim_.x_ref_dot_translational = gains_.A_ref_translational * state_.x_ref_translational
385  + gains_.B_ref_translational * csim_.r_cmd_translational;
386 
387  // Baseline PID controller terms [actual - reference_model]
388  csim_.outer_loop_dynamic_inversion = - vehicle_info.mass * GRAVITATIONAL_ACCELERATION * this->e3_basis;
389  csim_.outer_loop_P = - gains_.KP_translational * cim.translational_position_error;
390  csim_.outer_loop_D = - gains_.KD_translational * (cr.velocity - state_.x_ref_translational.tail<3>());
391  csim_.outer_loop_I = - gains_.KI_translational * state_.integral_translational_position_error;
392  // Baseline PID controller [actual - reference_model]
393  csim_.mu_PID_baseline_translational = csim_.outer_loop_dynamic_inversion +
394  vehicle_info.mass * (
395  csim_.outer_loop_P
396  + csim_.outer_loop_D
397  + csim_.outer_loop_I
398  + csim_.x_ref_dot_translational.tail<3>()
399  );
400 
401  // Velocity expressed in body/local reference frame
402  Eigen::Vector3d velocity_expr_in_local = cim.rotation_matrix_321_global_to_local * cr.velocity;
403  // Regressor vector
404  Eigen::Vector3d regressor_vector_translational = -0.5 * velocity_expr_in_local.norm() * velocity_expr_in_local;
405 
406  // Augmented regressor vector [includes the baseline controller]
407  csim_.augmented_regressor_vector_translational.head<3>() = csim_.mu_PID_baseline_translational;
408  csim_.augmented_regressor_vector_translational.tail<3>() = regressor_vector_translational;
409 
410  // Translational dynamics state
411  Eigen::Matrix<double, 6, 1> x_translational;
412  x_translational.head<3>() = cr.position;
413  x_translational.tail<3>() = cr.velocity;
414 
415  // Tracking error [transposed]
416  Eigen::Matrix<double, 1, 6> e_translational_transposed = (x_translational - state_.x_ref_translational).transpose();
417 
418  // Precomputing (e^T * P * B)
419  Eigen::Matrix<double, 1, 3> eTranspose_P_B_translational = e_translational_transposed *
420  gains_.P_translational *
421  gains_.B_translational;
422 
423  // Precomputing the norm of (e^T * P * B)
424  double eTranspose_P_B_norm_translational = eTranspose_P_B_translational.norm();
425 
426  // Computing the scalar value output from the dead-zone modification modulation function
427  csim_.dead_zone_value_translational = deadZoneModulationFunction(e_translational_transposed,
428  gains_.dead_zone_delta_translational,
429  gains_.dead_zone_e0_translational);
430 
431  // Adaptive law K_hat_x
432  csim_.K_hat_x_dot_translational = - gains_.Gamma_x_translational * csim_.dead_zone_value_translational * (
433  x_translational *
434  eTranspose_P_B_translational
435  + gains_.sigma_x_translational *
436  eTranspose_P_B_norm_translational *
437  state_.K_hat_x_translational);
438  // Projection operator K_hat_x
439  csim_.K_hat_x_dot_translational =
440  projection_operator::ellipsoid::projectionMatrix(state_.K_hat_x_translational,
441  csim_.K_hat_x_dot_translational,
442  gains_.x_e_x_translational,
443  gains_.S_x_translational,
444  gains_.epsilon_x_translational);
445 
446  // Adaptive law K_hat_r
447  csim_.K_hat_r_dot_translational = - gains_.Gamma_r_translational * csim_.dead_zone_value_translational * (
448  csim_.r_cmd_translational *
449  eTranspose_P_B_translational
450  + gains_.sigma_r_translational *
451  eTranspose_P_B_norm_translational *
452  state_.K_hat_r_translational);
453  // Projection operator K_hat_r
454  csim_.K_hat_r_dot_translational =
455  projection_operator::ellipsoid::projectionMatrix(state_.K_hat_r_translational,
456  csim_.K_hat_r_dot_translational,
457  gains_.x_e_r_translational,
458  gains_.S_r_translational,
459  gains_.epsilon_r_translational);
460 
461  // Adaptive law Theta_hat
462  csim_.Theta_hat_dot_translational = gains_.Gamma_Theta_translational * csim_.dead_zone_value_translational * (
463  csim_.augmented_regressor_vector_translational *
464  eTranspose_P_B_translational
465  - gains_.sigma_Theta_translational *
466  eTranspose_P_B_norm_translational *
467  state_.Theta_hat_translational);
468  // Projection operator Theta_hat
469  csim_.Theta_hat_dot_translational =
470  projection_operator::ellipsoid::projectionMatrix(state_.Theta_hat_translational,
471  csim_.Theta_hat_dot_translational,
472  gains_.x_e_Theta_translational,
473  gains_.S_Theta_translational,
474  gains_.epsilon_Theta_translational);
475 
476  // Adaptive control law
477  csim_.mu_adaptive_translational =
478  state_.K_hat_x_translational.transpose() * x_translational
479  + state_.K_hat_r_translational.transpose() * csim_.r_cmd_translational
480  - state_.Theta_hat_translational.transpose() * csim_.augmented_regressor_vector_translational;
481 
482  // Total virtual control input
483  cim.mu_translational_raw = csim_.mu_PID_baseline_translational +
484  csim_.mu_adaptive_translational;
485 
486 }
487 
488 /*
489  OUTER LOOP CONTROLLER USED FOR DEBUGGING, using 'user' instead of 'reference-model' in the baseline
490 */
491 void MRAC::computeOuterLoopDEBUGGING(ControlInternalMembers& cim,
492  VehicleInfo& vehicle_info,
493  StateController& state_,
494  ControlReferences& cr,
495  GainsMRAC& gains_,
496  ControllerSpecificInternalMembers& csim_)
497 {
498  // Compute the translational_position_error [actual - reference_model]
499  this->computeTranslationalPositionError(cim, cr.position, cr.user_defined_position);
500 
501  // Compute the translational_position_error_ref [reference_model - user_defined_trajectory]
502  csim_.translational_position_error_ref = state_.x_ref_translational.head<3>() - cr.user_defined_position;
503 
504  // Reference command input [reference_model - user_defined_trajectory]
505  csim_.r_cmd_translational = vehicle_info.mass * (
506  - gains_.KI_refmod_translational * state_.integral_translational_position_error_ref
507  + gains_.KP_refmod_translational * cr.user_defined_position
508  + gains_.KD_refmod_translational * cr.user_defined_velocity
509  + cr.user_defined_acceleration
510  );
511 
512  // Reference model
513  csim_.x_ref_dot_translational = gains_.A_ref_translational * state_.x_ref_translational
514  + gains_.B_ref_translational * csim_.r_cmd_translational;
515 
516  // Baseline PID controller terms [actual - user]
517  csim_.outer_loop_dynamic_inversion = - vehicle_info.mass * GRAVITATIONAL_ACCELERATION * this->e3_basis;
518  csim_.outer_loop_P = - gains_.KP_translational * cim.translational_position_error;
519  csim_.outer_loop_D = - gains_.KD_translational * (cr.velocity - cr.user_defined_velocity);
520  csim_.outer_loop_I = - gains_.KI_translational * state_.integral_translational_position_error;
521  // Baseline PID controller [actual - user]
522  csim_.mu_PID_baseline_translational = csim_.outer_loop_dynamic_inversion +
523  vehicle_info.mass * (
524  csim_.outer_loop_P
525  + csim_.outer_loop_D
526  + csim_.outer_loop_I
527  + cr.user_defined_acceleration
528  );
529 
530  // Velocity expressed in body/local reference frame
531  Eigen::Vector3d velocity_expr_in_local = cim.rotation_matrix_321_global_to_local * cr.velocity;
532  // Regressor vector
533  Eigen::Vector3d regressor_vector_translational = -0.5 * velocity_expr_in_local.norm() * velocity_expr_in_local;
534 
535  // Augmented regressor vector [includes the baseline controller]
536  csim_.augmented_regressor_vector_translational.head<3>() = csim_.mu_PID_baseline_translational;
537  csim_.augmented_regressor_vector_translational.tail<3>() = regressor_vector_translational;
538 
539  // Translational dynamics state
540  Eigen::Matrix<double, 6, 1> x_translational;
541  x_translational.head<3>() = cr.position;
542  x_translational.tail<3>() = cr.velocity;
543 
544  // Tracking error [transposed]
545  Eigen::Matrix<double, 1, 6> e_translational_transposed = (x_translational - state_.x_ref_translational).transpose();
546 
547  // Precomputing (e^T * P * B)
548  Eigen::Matrix<double, 1, 3> eTranspose_P_B_translational = e_translational_transposed *
549  gains_.P_translational *
550  gains_.B_translational;
551 
552  // Precomputing the norm of (e^T * P * B)
553  double eTranspose_P_B_norm_translational = eTranspose_P_B_translational.norm();
554 
555  // Computing the scalar value output from the dead-zone modification modulation function
556  csim_.dead_zone_value_translational = deadZoneModulationFunction(e_translational_transposed,
557  gains_.dead_zone_delta_translational,
558  gains_.dead_zone_e0_translational);
559 
560  // Adaptive law K_hat_x
561  csim_.K_hat_x_dot_translational = - gains_.Gamma_x_translational * csim_.dead_zone_value_translational * (
562  x_translational *
563  eTranspose_P_B_translational
564  + gains_.sigma_x_translational *
565  eTranspose_P_B_norm_translational *
566  state_.K_hat_x_translational);
567  // Projection operator K_hat_x
568  csim_.K_hat_x_dot_translational =
569  projection_operator::ellipsoid::projectionMatrix(state_.K_hat_x_translational,
570  csim_.K_hat_x_dot_translational,
571  gains_.x_e_x_translational,
572  gains_.S_x_translational,
573  gains_.epsilon_x_translational);
574 
575  // Adaptive law K_hat_r
576  csim_.K_hat_r_dot_translational = - gains_.Gamma_r_translational * csim_.dead_zone_value_translational * (
577  csim_.r_cmd_translational *
578  eTranspose_P_B_translational
579  + gains_.sigma_r_translational *
580  eTranspose_P_B_norm_translational *
581  state_.K_hat_r_translational);
582  // Projection operator K_hat_r
583  csim_.K_hat_r_dot_translational =
584  projection_operator::ellipsoid::projectionMatrix(state_.K_hat_r_translational,
585  csim_.K_hat_r_dot_translational,
586  gains_.x_e_r_translational,
587  gains_.S_r_translational,
588  gains_.epsilon_r_translational);
589 
590  // Adaptive law Theta_hat
591  csim_.Theta_hat_dot_translational = gains_.Gamma_Theta_translational * csim_.dead_zone_value_translational * (
592  csim_.augmented_regressor_vector_translational *
593  eTranspose_P_B_translational
594  - gains_.sigma_Theta_translational *
595  eTranspose_P_B_norm_translational *
596  state_.Theta_hat_translational);
597  // Projection operator Theta_hat
598  csim_.Theta_hat_dot_translational =
599  projection_operator::ellipsoid::projectionMatrix(state_.Theta_hat_translational,
600  csim_.Theta_hat_dot_translational,
601  gains_.x_e_Theta_translational,
602  gains_.S_Theta_translational,
603  gains_.epsilon_Theta_translational);
604 
605  // Adaptive control law
606  csim_.mu_adaptive_translational =
607  state_.K_hat_x_translational.transpose() * x_translational
608  + state_.K_hat_r_translational.transpose() * csim_.r_cmd_translational
609  - state_.Theta_hat_translational.transpose() * csim_.augmented_regressor_vector_translational;
610 
611  // Total virtual control input
612  cim.mu_translational_raw = csim_.mu_PID_baseline_translational +
613  csim_.mu_adaptive_translational;
614 
615 }
616 
617 /*
618  INNER LOOP CONTROLLER
619 */
620 void MRAC::computeInnerLoop(ControlInternalMembers& cim,
621  VehicleInfo& vehicle_info,
622  StateController& state_,
623  ControlReferences& cr,
624  GainsMRAC& gains_,
625  ControllerSpecificInternalMembers& csim_)
626 {
627  // Compute angular_error [actual - desired]
628  this->computeAngularError(cim, cr.euler_angles_rpy, cim.angular_position_desired);
629 
630  // Compute jacobian matrix
631  csim_.jacobian_matrix = this->jacobianMatrix(cr.euler_angles_rpy[0], cr.euler_angles_rpy[1]);
632 
633  // Compute time derivative of jacobian matrix
634  csim_.jacobian_matrix_dot = this->jacobianMatrixDot(cr.euler_angles_rpy[0],
635  cr.euler_angles_rpy[1],
636  cim.euler_angles_rpy_dot[0],
637  cim.euler_angles_rpy_dot[1]);
638 
639  // Compute command angular velocity
640  csim_.omega_cmd_rotational = csim_.jacobian_matrix * (
641  - gains_.KP_omega_cmd_rotational * cim.angular_error
642  - gains_.KI_omega_cmd_rotational * state_.integral_angular_error
643  + cim.angular_position_desired_dot
644  );
645 
646  // Compute time derivative of command angular velocity
647  csim_.omega_cmd_dot_rotational =
648  csim_.jacobian_matrix_dot * (
649  - gains_.KP_omega_cmd_rotational * cim.angular_error
650  - gains_.KI_omega_cmd_rotational * state_.integral_angular_error
651  + cim.angular_position_desired_dot)
652  + csim_.jacobian_matrix * (
653  - gains_.KP_omega_cmd_rotational * (cim.euler_angles_rpy_dot - cim.angular_position_desired_dot)
654  - gains_.KI_omega_cmd_rotational * cim.angular_error
655  + cim.angular_position_desired_dot_dot
656  );
657 
658  // Compute the angular_velocity_error_ref [refmod - cmd]
659  csim_.angular_velocity_error_ref = state_.omega_ref_rotational - csim_.omega_cmd_rotational;
660 
661  // Reference command input [refmod - cmd]
662  csim_.r_cmd_rotational =
663  gains_.KP_omega_ref_rotational * csim_.omega_cmd_rotational
664  - gains_.KI_omega_ref_rotational * state_.integral_angular_velocity_error_ref
665  + csim_.omega_cmd_dot_rotational;
666 
667  // Reference model
668  csim_.omega_ref_dot_rotational =
669  - gains_.KP_omega_ref_rotational * state_.omega_ref_rotational
670  + csim_.r_cmd_rotational;
671 
672  // Baseline PID controller terms [actual - reference_model]
673  csim_.inner_loop_dynamic_inversion = cr.angular_velocity.cross(vehicle_info.inertia_matrix * cr.angular_velocity);
674  csim_.inner_loop_P = - gains_.KP_rotational * cim.angular_error;
675  csim_.inner_loop_D = - gains_.KD_rotational * (cr.angular_velocity - state_.omega_ref_rotational);
676  csim_.inner_loop_I = - gains_.KI_rotational * state_.integral_angular_error;
677  // Baseline PID controller [actual - reference_model]
678  csim_.tau_PID_baseline_rotational = csim_.inner_loop_dynamic_inversion +
679  vehicle_info.inertia_matrix * (
680  csim_.inner_loop_P
681  + csim_.inner_loop_D
682  + csim_.inner_loop_I
683  + csim_.omega_ref_dot_rotational
684  );
685 
686  // Regressor vector
687  Eigen::Vector3d regressor_vector_rotational;
688  regressor_vector_rotational <<
689  cr.angular_velocity[1] * cr.angular_velocity[2],
690  cr.angular_velocity[0] * cr.angular_velocity[2],
691  cr.angular_velocity[0] * cr.angular_velocity[1];
692 
693  // Augmented regressor vector [includes the baseline controller]
694  csim_.augmented_regressor_vector_rotational.head<3>() = csim_.tau_PID_baseline_rotational;
695  csim_.augmented_regressor_vector_rotational.tail<3>() = regressor_vector_rotational;
696 
697  // Tracking error [transposed]
698  Eigen::Matrix<double, 1, 3> e_rotational_transposed = (cr.angular_velocity - state_.omega_ref_rotational).transpose();
699 
700  // Precomputing (e^T * P * B)
701  Eigen::Matrix<double, 1, 3> eTranspose_P_B_rotational = e_rotational_transposed *
702  gains_.P_rotational *
703  gains_.B_rotational;
704 
705  // Precomputing the norm of (e^T * P * B)
706  double eTranspose_P_B_norm_rotational = eTranspose_P_B_rotational.norm();
707 
708  // Computing the scalar value output from the dead-zone modification modulation function
709  csim_.dead_zone_value_rotational = deadZoneModulationFunction(e_rotational_transposed,
710  gains_.dead_zone_delta_rotational,
711  gains_.dead_zone_e0_rotational);
712 
713  // Adaptive law K_hat_x
714  csim_.K_hat_x_dot_rotational = - gains_.Gamma_x_rotational * csim_.dead_zone_value_rotational * (
715  cr.angular_velocity *
716  eTranspose_P_B_rotational
717  + gains_.sigma_x_rotational *
718  eTranspose_P_B_norm_rotational *
719  state_.K_hat_x_rotational);
720  // Projection operator K_hat_x
721  csim_.K_hat_x_dot_rotational =
722  projection_operator::ellipsoid::projectionMatrix(state_.K_hat_x_rotational,
723  csim_.K_hat_x_dot_rotational,
724  gains_.x_e_x_rotational,
725  gains_.S_x_rotational,
726  gains_.epsilon_x_rotational);
727 
728  // Adaptive law K_hat_r
729  csim_.K_hat_r_dot_rotational = - gains_.Gamma_r_rotational * csim_.dead_zone_value_rotational * (
730  csim_.r_cmd_rotational *
731  eTranspose_P_B_rotational
732  + gains_.sigma_r_rotational *
733  eTranspose_P_B_norm_rotational *
734  state_.K_hat_r_rotational);
735  // Projection operator K_hat_r
736  csim_.K_hat_r_dot_rotational =
737  projection_operator::ellipsoid::projectionMatrix(state_.K_hat_r_rotational,
738  csim_.K_hat_r_dot_rotational,
739  gains_.x_e_r_rotational,
740  gains_.S_r_rotational,
741  gains_.epsilon_r_rotational);
742 
743  // Adaptive law Theta_hat
744  csim_.Theta_hat_dot_rotational = gains_.Gamma_Theta_rotational * csim_.dead_zone_value_rotational * (
745  csim_.augmented_regressor_vector_rotational *
746  eTranspose_P_B_rotational
747  - gains_.sigma_Theta_rotational *
748  eTranspose_P_B_norm_rotational *
749  state_.Theta_hat_rotational);
750  // Projection operator Theta_hat
751  csim_.Theta_hat_dot_rotational =
752  projection_operator::ellipsoid::projectionMatrix(state_.Theta_hat_rotational,
753  csim_.Theta_hat_dot_rotational,
754  gains_.x_e_Theta_rotational,
755  gains_.S_Theta_rotational,
756  gains_.epsilon_Theta_rotational);
757 
758  // Adaptive control law
759  csim_.tau_adaptive_rotational =
760  state_.K_hat_x_rotational.transpose() * cr.angular_velocity
761  + state_.K_hat_r_rotational.transpose() * csim_.r_cmd_rotational
762  - state_.Theta_hat_rotational.transpose() * csim_.augmented_regressor_vector_rotational;
763 
764  // Total control input
765  cim.U2_U3_U4 = csim_.tau_PID_baseline_rotational +
766  csim_.tau_adaptive_rotational;
767 
768 }
769 
770 /*
771  INNER LOOP CONTROLLER USED FOR DEBUGGING, using 'desired' instead of 'reference-model' in the baseline
772 */
773 void MRAC::computeInnerLoopDEBUGGING(ControlInternalMembers& cim,
774  VehicleInfo& vehicle_info,
775  StateController& state_,
776  ControlReferences& cr,
777  GainsMRAC& gains_,
778  ControllerSpecificInternalMembers& csim_)
779 {
780  // Compute angular_error [actual - desired]
781  this->computeAngularError(cim, cr.euler_angles_rpy, cim.angular_position_desired);
782 
783  // Compute jacobian matrix
784  csim_.jacobian_matrix = this->jacobianMatrix(cr.euler_angles_rpy[0], cr.euler_angles_rpy[1]);
785 
786  // Compute time derivative of jacobian matrix
787  csim_.jacobian_matrix_dot = this->jacobianMatrixDot(cr.euler_angles_rpy[0],
788  cr.euler_angles_rpy[1],
789  cim.euler_angles_rpy_dot[0],
790  cim.euler_angles_rpy_dot[1]);
791 
792  // Compute command angular velocity
793  csim_.omega_cmd_rotational = csim_.jacobian_matrix * (
794  - gains_.KP_omega_cmd_rotational * cim.angular_error
795  - gains_.KI_omega_cmd_rotational * state_.integral_angular_error
796  + cim.angular_position_desired_dot
797  );
798 
799  // Compute time derivative of command angular velocity
800  csim_.omega_cmd_dot_rotational =
801  csim_.jacobian_matrix_dot * (
802  - gains_.KP_omega_cmd_rotational * cim.angular_error
803  - gains_.KI_omega_cmd_rotational * state_.integral_angular_error
804  + cim.angular_position_desired_dot)
805  + csim_.jacobian_matrix * (
806  - gains_.KP_omega_cmd_rotational * (cim.euler_angles_rpy_dot - cim.angular_position_desired_dot)
807  - gains_.KI_omega_cmd_rotational * cim.angular_error
808  + cim.angular_position_desired_dot_dot
809  );
810 
811  // Compute the angular_velocity_error_ref [refmod - cmd]
812  csim_.angular_velocity_error_ref = state_.omega_ref_rotational - csim_.omega_cmd_rotational;
813 
814  // Reference command input [refmod - cmd]
815  csim_.r_cmd_rotational =
816  gains_.KP_omega_ref_rotational * csim_.omega_cmd_rotational
817  - gains_.KI_omega_ref_rotational * state_.integral_angular_velocity_error_ref
818  + csim_.omega_cmd_dot_rotational;
819 
820  // Reference model
821  csim_.omega_ref_dot_rotational =
822  - gains_.KP_omega_ref_rotational * state_.omega_ref_rotational
823  + csim_.r_cmd_rotational;
824 
825  // Baseline PID controller terms [actual - desired]
826  csim_.inner_loop_dynamic_inversion = cr.angular_velocity.cross(vehicle_info.inertia_matrix * cr.angular_velocity);
827  csim_.inner_loop_P = - gains_.KP_rotational * cim.angular_error;
828  csim_.inner_loop_D = - gains_.KD_rotational * (cim.euler_angles_rpy_dot - cim.angular_position_desired_dot);
829  csim_.inner_loop_I = - gains_.KI_rotational * state_.integral_angular_error;
830  // Baseline PID controller [actual - desired]
831 
832  csim_.tau_PID_baseline_rotational = csim_.inner_loop_dynamic_inversion +
833  vehicle_info.inertia_matrix * (
834  csim_.inner_loop_P
835  + csim_.inner_loop_D
836  + csim_.inner_loop_I
837  + cim.angular_position_desired_dot_dot
838  );
839 
840  // Regressor vector
841  Eigen::Vector3d regressor_vector_rotational;
842  regressor_vector_rotational <<
843  cr.angular_velocity[1] * cr.angular_velocity[2],
844  cr.angular_velocity[0] * cr.angular_velocity[2],
845  cr.angular_velocity[0] * cr.angular_velocity[1];
846 
847  // Augmented regressor vector [includes the baseline controller]
848  csim_.augmented_regressor_vector_rotational.head<3>() = csim_.tau_PID_baseline_rotational;
849  csim_.augmented_regressor_vector_rotational.tail<3>() = regressor_vector_rotational;
850 
851  // Tracking error [transposed]
852  Eigen::Matrix<double, 1, 3> e_rotational_transposed = (cr.angular_velocity - state_.omega_ref_rotational).transpose();
853 
854  // Precomputing (e^T * P * B)
855  Eigen::Matrix<double, 1, 3> eTranspose_P_B_rotational = e_rotational_transposed *
856  gains_.P_rotational *
857  gains_.B_rotational;
858 
859  // Precomputing the norm of (e^T * P * B)
860  double eTranspose_P_B_norm_rotational = eTranspose_P_B_rotational.norm();
861 
862  // Computing the scalar value output from the dead-zone modification modulation function
863  csim_.dead_zone_value_rotational = deadZoneModulationFunction(e_rotational_transposed,
864  gains_.dead_zone_delta_rotational,
865  gains_.dead_zone_e0_rotational);
866 
867  // Adaptive law K_hat_x
868  csim_.K_hat_x_dot_rotational = - gains_.Gamma_x_rotational * csim_.dead_zone_value_rotational * (
869  cr.angular_velocity *
870  eTranspose_P_B_rotational
871  + gains_.sigma_x_rotational *
872  eTranspose_P_B_norm_rotational *
873  state_.K_hat_x_rotational);
874  // Projection operator K_hat_x
875  csim_.K_hat_x_dot_rotational =
876  projection_operator::ellipsoid::projectionMatrix(state_.K_hat_x_rotational,
877  csim_.K_hat_x_dot_rotational,
878  gains_.x_e_x_rotational,
879  gains_.S_x_rotational,
880  gains_.epsilon_x_rotational);
881 
882  // Adaptive law K_hat_r
883  csim_.K_hat_r_dot_rotational = - gains_.Gamma_r_rotational * csim_.dead_zone_value_rotational * (
884  csim_.r_cmd_rotational *
885  eTranspose_P_B_rotational
886  + gains_.sigma_r_rotational *
887  eTranspose_P_B_norm_rotational *
888  state_.K_hat_r_rotational);
889  // Projection operator K_hat_r
890  csim_.K_hat_r_dot_rotational =
891  projection_operator::ellipsoid::projectionMatrix(state_.K_hat_r_rotational,
892  csim_.K_hat_r_dot_rotational,
893  gains_.x_e_r_rotational,
894  gains_.S_r_rotational,
895  gains_.epsilon_r_rotational);
896 
897  // Adaptive law Theta_hat
898  csim_.Theta_hat_dot_rotational = gains_.Gamma_Theta_rotational * csim_.dead_zone_value_rotational * (
899  csim_.augmented_regressor_vector_rotational *
900  eTranspose_P_B_rotational
901  - gains_.sigma_Theta_rotational *
902  eTranspose_P_B_norm_rotational *
903  state_.Theta_hat_rotational);
904  // Projection operator Theta_hat
905  csim_.Theta_hat_dot_rotational =
906  projection_operator::ellipsoid::projectionMatrix(state_.Theta_hat_rotational,
907  csim_.Theta_hat_dot_rotational,
908  gains_.x_e_Theta_rotational,
909  gains_.S_Theta_rotational,
910  gains_.epsilon_Theta_rotational);
911 
912  // Adaptive control law
913  csim_.tau_adaptive_rotational =
914  state_.K_hat_x_rotational.transpose() * cr.angular_velocity
915  + state_.K_hat_r_rotational.transpose() * csim_.r_cmd_rotational
916  - state_.Theta_hat_rotational.transpose() * csim_.augmented_regressor_vector_rotational;
917 
918  // Total control input
919  cim.U2_U3_U4 = csim_.tau_PID_baseline_rotational +
920  csim_.tau_adaptive_rotational;
921 
922 }
923 
924 
925 /*
926  MRAC Control algorithm
927 */
928 void MRAC::computeControlAlgorithm()
929 {
930 
931  /*
932  Function to compute various rotational parameters.
933  This function sets the desired angle, angular rate and angular acceleration for yaw,
934  computes the inverse of the Jacobian matrix, the derivative of the Euler angles,
935  and the rotation matrix to go from global to local coordinates.
936  */
937  this->computeRotationalParameters(cim, cr);
938 
939  /*
940  Compute OUTER LOOP CONTROLLER
941  */
942  this->computeOuterLoop(cim, vehicle_info, state_, cr, gains_, csim_);
943  // this->computeOuterLoopDEBUGGING(cim, vehicle_info, state_, cr, gains_, csim_); // FOR DEBUGGING !!!!
944 
945  /* IMPLEMENT THE SAFETY MECHANISM HERE */
946 
947  /*
948  Compute:
949  the Total Thrust: cim.U_control_inputs[0],
950  the desired roll angle: cim.roll_desired,
951  the desired pitch angle: cim.pitch_desired.
952  */
953  this->compute_U1_RollDes_PitchDes(cim);
954 
955  /*
956  Compute the variables used for the differentiator of the desired roll and pitch angles.
957  */
958  this->computeFilterDifferentiatorVariables(cim, vehicle_info, state_);
959 
960  /*
961  Compute INNER LOOP CONTROLLER
962  */
963  // this->computeInnerLoop(cim, vehicle_info, state_, cr, gains_, csim_);
964  this->computeInnerLoopDEBUGGING(cim, vehicle_info, state_, cr, gains_, csim_); // FOR DEBUGGING !!!!
965 
966  /*
967  Compute the thrust in Newton that each motor needs to produce and convert it
968  from Newton to the normalized value comprised between 0 and 1 to be sent to Pixhawk
969  */
970  // FOR X8COPTER
971  this->computeNormalizedThrust(cim, vehicle_info);
972 
973  // FOR QUADCOPTER
974  // this->computeNormalizedThrustQuadcopterMode(cim, vehicle_info);
975 
976 }
